attributes.action: Resignation of Sheffield Hallam MP Jared O’Mara, prompting a by-election.
attributes.additional_details:
The BBC News article about the comments

http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-england-south-yorkshire-41724540
attributes.background: This  petition calls on Jared O’Mara to resign as an MP because of his sexist and homophobic comments.

rejection.details: The resignation of an MP would be an individual decision for that person, and not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.
